result.execSummary:
The defendant Brandon S. Abeita was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant Brandon S. Abeita in court, in custody via video.   Court Commissioner calls case(s) and recites appearances - questions defendant re: arrearages and employment.  DE would like to get out and find employment.  Court: To see Dianne McNamer to perform community service if not eligible to pay $50.00 per month as to a payment plan payment to be made 30 days after release of today.
OFF THE RECORD:  Defendant Brandon S. Abeita not in court.  Warrant remain active

Defendant Brandon S. Abeita in court with attorney James C. McLaughlin.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State 15 CT 45 NC to count 1 - .1459 - $2452.00 - 270 days jail credit 86 days time served - 30 mo. dl revocation - AODA - IID - DNA sample/surcharge and balance of counts to be dismissed.  15 Cm 193 - amend to straight DC - NC plea 30 days county jail concurrent to 15 CT 45 and $579.00 fine - moved to dismiss the traffic fine.  Atty MCL agrees as does the defendant.  Defendant entered plea of NC to 15 CT 45 count 1 and 15 CM 193 as amended.  Court questions defendant as to plea questionnaire.  Court amends 15 CM 193 to straight DC.  Court finds defendant guilty count 1 in 15 CT 45 and guilty to 15 CM 193 as amended.  Coutnt 2 DRI.  State argues sentencing.  Atty McL argues sentencing.

COURT:  15 CT 45 - Fine 2452.00 given 60 dtp or set up payment plan -.159  270 days county jail with credit for 86 days time served and huber - 30 month DL revocation - IID 30 months plus 270 days effective 45 days from today  - AODA and any follow thru to complete within 150 days - DNA sample/Surcharge

15 CM 193 - 30 days county jail concurrent to 15 CT 45 and fine of $579.00

15 TR 794 to be dismissed.
